Prebon needed to know the whole situation before he could be effective as a=
 training bot. "I'd like to see some maps, logs, and weather patterns befor=
e I begin." He stated calmly looking around the room. He started to pace ac=
ross the room with his hands clenched behind his back, "And of course I'll =
need the service records of the bots wyo will be placed in my custody." He =
turned to face Shivah once more. 'By the way, Greatness comes from those wh=
o MAKE the history not the ones who merely study it." Prebon himself had st=
udied history and knew that the only way to avoid the same mistakes is to c=
hange the history.
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Airshadow Nightl=
ight 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Tuesday, May 29, 2001 5:02 PM
 =
 Subject: Re: It's Showtime


  Shivah:: 

  Shivah sighed again and said "=
First of all, I'm very sorry about Attilla's behavior, he's extremely rude.=
.. altough Luzbel and Alecto are worst. Second I'm Shivah, commander of the=
 subgroups of Drakobots and my boss is Darkfate, master of the BlackFortres=
s where you're... Rule here is easy, don't try anything against The Top bos=
s and all will be ok... Do you like meet the base or do you rather that I s=
ee your leadership's skills first? " 

    CYBERWOLF4 <cyberwolf4@prodigy.n=
et> wrote: 

    Prebon followed Ainto the room stepping aside to watch the=
 Drakon leave. I see you enjoy history almost as much as I do." he claimed =
picking up the book and tossing it back to Shivah.  "I see that you are Pre=
dacon but I am unaware of your rank or subgroup." the snide Trainers manner=
s were upalling as he stared the other bot eye to eye. "Now tell me, why wa=
s I transferred here and where are the recruits that need to be placed in l=
ine?" A trainer unit was only used for recruitment programming, a sort of B=
oot camp for Transformers. A dull unglorified life as it were, work with th=
e new units and watch them soar through the ranks to end up bossing around =
thier former commanders. As a Trainer unit the only authority he had was on=
 the training field, now that he was removed he'd be lucky to be looked at =
as a qualified unit commander.
      ----- Original Message ----- 
      Fr=
om: airly2000@... 
      To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
      Sent: Mond=
ay, May 28, 2001 11:32 PM
      Subject: RE: It's Showtime


      Attilla/=
Shivah:

      Shivah was sat camly reading a cyberbook in one room when At=
tilla arrived, the first-born of Drakonbots didn't noticed that about (Atti=
la's arriving ) until his young brother snatched the cybe-book and Attilla =
shouted while he wished annoy his old brother. 

       
      "What are yo=
u reading Old-bro??? "THE PREDACON'S WARS... " UGHHH!!! You should better d=
o other things than read a bored History book!!!.. " 

      "Who doesn't k=
now what were past's mistakes, he will make them in the future... If we lik=
e beat our enemies, we must study our past... it's easy to understand" repl=
yed Shivah aparently calmed.

      "I Insist that you should better do oth=
er things, bro" said Attilla "Well, my pal Preborn has some complaints and =
he likes speak with you... So I leave you alone"

      And Attila left the=
 place throwing the cyber-book toward a table that was around, Shivah sighe=
d and waited that Preborn spoke.

        ----- Original Message ----- 
   =
     From: CYBERWOLF4 
        To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
        Sent: Tu=
esday, May 29, 2001 4:10 AM
        Subject: Re: It's Showtime


        Pr=
ebon followed Attilla at a safe distance. He wanted to remain out of the ot=
her bots reach in case this was some sort of trick. He serveyed each twist =
and turn downloading it to memory so he wouldn't get lost.
          ----- =
Original Message ----- 
          From: airly2000@... 
          To: =
nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
          Sent: Monday, May 28, 2001 10:49 PM
     =
     Subject: RE: It's Showtime


          "Ok Preborn" said Attilla "Let'=
s go to see Shivah, i can bet that I know where's he right now"

          =
Attilla walked and he invited Preborn to follow him



            ----- Or=
iginal Message ----- 
            From: CYBERWOLF4 
            To: nbwrpg@=
yahoogroups.com 
            Sent: Tuesday, May 29, 2001 3:38 AM
          =
  Subject: Re: It's Showtime


            Prebons face nearly turned to sh=
ock. this bot seemed like it was completely oblivious to the name Prebon. H=
is very name was spoken with honor for being the Trainer of some of the mos=
t successfull units in the Predacon army. "My name is Prebon, remember it w=
ith respect and dignity." this bot obviously needed to be taught some order=
. Prebon began to wonder if that is why he had been selected to transfer to=
 this out of the way rock in the universe.
              ----- Original Mes=
sage ----- 
              From: airly2000@... 
              To: nbwr=
pg@yahoogroups.com 
              Sent: Monday, May 28, 2001 10:23 PM
     =
         Subject: RE: It's Showtime


              Attilla:

             =
 "Don't press your luck, dwarf" said inside his mind the male and told to P=
reborn with the same tone "Follow me... with whom I have the honor?"
      =
          ----- Original Message ----- 
                From: CYBERWOLF4 
 =
               To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
                Sent: Tuesday, M=
ay 29, 2001 3:15 AM
                Subject: Re: It's Showtime


          =
      Prebon looked over Attilla, the oposite bot was slightly taller and m=
ore armored than himself, The former Trainer leader always tried to size up=
 a possible opponent before a fight. "Very well" he said crossing his arms =
tightly in a peturbed fashion, "Then I will ask Shivah about how I AM to be=
 treated." His arms went to his sides and he turned towards the door. "If y=
ou would be so considerate as to introduce us I would be greatfull" He cont=
inued in mock courtesy making a request sound like an order.
              =
    ----- Original Message ----- 
                  From: airly2000@yahoo.c=
om 
                  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
                  Sent: M=
onday, May 28, 2001 9:13 AM
                  Subject: RE: It's Showtime


=
                  Attilla:

                  "Nope, it isn't the way " ans=
wered  Attilla "What do you think if Shivah solve this trouble... He can ex=
plain you what happened Ok?"
                    ----- Original Message ---=
-- 
                    From: CYBERWOLF4 
                    To: nbwrpg@ya=
hoogroups.com 
                    Sent: Monday, May 28, 2001 10:46 AM
    =
                Subject: Re: It's Showtime


                    Prebon ste=
pped out, his memories were either gone or distorted but his leadership pro=
grams were still intact. He remembered how roughly he was treated and how h=
e was slammed into the CR chamber. To top it off he was always cranky when =
he woke up. "What is the meaning of this travesty?" he yelled. He saw Preda=
con emblem on Attilla so he knew thought he wasn't a POW. "Is this any way =
to treat one of the Predacons best training units?" his record of service w=
ould have spoke for itself if he hadn't erased it when he left the Predacon=
s to start his own unit.
                      ----- Original Message -----=
 
                      From: airly2000@... 
                      To=
: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
                      Sent: Sunday, May 27, 2001 =
10:01 PM
                      Subject: RE: It's Showtime


               =
       Attilla:

                      "Memories erased, reprogramation end=
ed"thought Attilla "This guy is ready to start duties."

                  =
    Attilla typed some buttons and watied to Cr's door 0pen, "Hey, Hello"

=
                      The bot was ready to fight just in case.
